tool_description: An API that takes in your cards and the dealers upcard and outputs the optimal choice based on the well-known "Basic Strategy". It includes hitting, standing, doubling, splitting and surrendering.
name: BlackJack Basic Strategy
title: BlackJack Basic Strategy

api_list.name: True Count
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to determine the True Count of the current card shoe. It takes in the running count of the game and the number of decks remaining in play and outputs the true count as a number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/trueCount/7/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/trueCount/{runningcount}/{decksremaining}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Pairs
api_list.description: This endpoint is to be used when the player has a pair. With this endpoint, the total value of the player's cards are not to be input, but the value of the card which there are two of. For example, when the player has a Queen and a Jack, the pairOf parameter should be 10.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/pair/3/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/pair/{pairof}/{dealerupcard}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Soft Totals
api_list.description: This endpoint is to be used when one has an Ace which represents an 11 EXCEPT for when one has a pair of Aces (See 'Pairs' endpoint). If one does not have an Ace which represents an 11, the 'Hard Totals' endpoint should be used.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/soft/15/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/soft/{playertotal}/{dealerupcard}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hard Totals
api_list.description: This is the endpoint to use when one does not have a pair (See 'Pairs' endpoint) or an Ace that represents as 11 (See 'Soft Totals' endpoint). For example, if one has a 5 and a 7 and the dealer has a 3.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/hard/17/11"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com/hard/{playertotal}/{dealerupcard}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blackjack-basic-strategy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
